customer_addr:
10151 SW State Rd 247
Lake City, FL 32024

citations.narrative:
The licensee moved to a new location and failed to notify APHIS Animal Care of the change in address. Upon contacting
the licensee by phone, she stated that she had moved to Tennessee and was no longer at the site address.
Failure to notify Animal Care of a change in location can make it difficult to verify regulated activities and ensure the
health and wellbeing of regulated animals.
A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days before any change in the name, address, management,
substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or type of animals.
Correct by: September 30, 2025.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on
September 16, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by telephone and text. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee moved to a new location and failed to notify APHIS Animal Care of the change in address. Upon contacting 
the licensee by phone, she stated that she had moved to Tennessee and was no longer at the site address.  
Failure to notify Animal Care of a change in location can make it difficult to verify regulated activities and ensure the 
health and wellbeing of regulated animals. 
A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days before any change in the name, address, management, 
substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or type of animals. 
Correct by: September 30, 2025. 
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 
September 16, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by telephone and text. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
